Recommendations: the department of nursing should adhere with the guideline define by the university manual of operation in extension

the design extension program and project should be base don need and problem of the adopt community a research of the need and problem of the adopt community should be undertaken result of the research shouid be use as baseline information for design the program and project

regular monitoring and evaluation of extension project should be undertaken continuously a system of monitoring and evaluation may be design appropriate instrument for monitoring and evaluation may also be developed
more faculty member of the department of nursing should actively participate in it extension and community involvement project and other related activity
adopt community should be encourage to participate actively in the planning implementation and evaluation of extension project
the department of nursing should make effort to generate additional fund for it extension program and project
wider dissemination of it extension program and project should be make
a systematic and continuous documentation of the extension program project and other related activity should be pursue vigorously
